eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: The bestial Sui matter comes to a head. Atop the Yumen city tower, Liang Xun confesses his actions to the Grand Tutor. Inside an ancient temple outside the city, two proxies reunite after a long time.

attributes.text: Victoria is so close...
It's snowing again... they should be wearing their winter garb now.
She was like a little stove as a child, aflame with passion in her veins. This snow and wind won't faze her.
Baizao winters are never this cold. She said the first volume should be done when spring comes.
That's good...
At life's end, I find no worries left to bear.

attributes.content: The man takes off his mandarin garb, folds it carefully. and places it down next to the books he used to carry, before bowing three times to the east.
He walks out of the camp.
Your flames are indeed hotter now.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Your Arts are greatly burdening your body, Infected.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Scared of the heat?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Heh, it's just my blood... Though I know I'm standing here only because so many others have shed their own blood.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Seems like you already know a lot.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Not much at all, but there's just one thing I need to know—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Those who had their names erased, those who died dubious deaths... they need an explanation, an answer.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: To be honest, I didn't think my life would have such a complicated backstory, or that I'd fight for something other than the Infected.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But now I realize that injustice is the same for everyone. And I will spill my blood to end every injustice I encounter.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Burning a blaze with your blood... Infected, you resemble the righteous of old.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: But don't rush to conclusions about justice when a single leaf blocks your view of the entire forest.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: In any case, I have been ordered to bring you back, and you absolutely cannot be let free...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I know, I know... I've met your type before, plenty of times.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I guess I can't paint you all as bad guys. You've just been trained to shed no blood or tears... so you stop caring about anyone else's.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Whatever. I won't argue—you sure can try to stop me though.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You are the enemy... but your courage deserves praise.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Careful now. I'll spare your life, but I can't guarantee you won't lose a limb or two.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Zongguan Bailei Zhengfa, cleave!
It's you...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I know you have a lot of questions, but there's only one pressing matter at hand.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You wanted to see the True Lung, yes? I'm here to help.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan? You should be behind bars!
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Yet I stand here before you now.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You've already lost to me once. This time, neither of you will escape.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Don't worry, I have no plans to fight you alone.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I know I asked to tag along...
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: But this opponent... will be hard to handle.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: An accomplice, even...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: So you were the one who freed her from prison...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I had to employ some crude measures, but I tried my best to avoid harming any innocents.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Don't worry about settling the score. I have too many crimes I can't escape from, and this is just one more. When this matter is over, I will surrender myself to the law.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: But now, there is something to be done, and a meeting to be had.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: A Discipline and Supervision Censor colluding with a Judicial Review Office Deputy Minister in revolt... such a preposterous scene is a first for me.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: If this is preposterous enough, then allow me to inconsequentially join the fray as well.
I trust you've been well, Drillmaster?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Taihe?! Were you not gravely wounded at Yumen—
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Yes... my injuries were quite serious. I'm unsure if my skills are even one-third as powerful as they used to be.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Which is why I hope there will be no cause for me to make any moves today.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Why would even you participate in this...?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I have yet to grasp the full picture as to why Deputy Minister Lin has suddenly appeared here. But the two of you are my most respected colleagues, so I can only ask, as an old friend, that you two leave some space for negotiation.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: How can you expect me to turn a blind eye when you lot insist on doing such a traitorous act?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: 'Loyalty over righteousness'... But whoever said you could only choose one from the two?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Righteousness...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.text: You're familiar with the case, and the two individuals involved in it stand here before you now.
Right or wrong, life or death. The choice is yours.
But Shifu... this matter came to be from complicated causes, how can what is good or evil be determined so easily—
The blade is in your hand. Make your choice!
Shifu...!
You hesitate still?!
Shifu, if 'righteousness' can only be upheld with the edge of my blade, then what sets it apart from 'violence'?
I don't understand...

attributes.content: Stop dallying and go inside!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Don't even think about—
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: A signal to lower the Forbidden City's defenses...?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Could it be... His Imperial Majesty?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: You can see the Forbidden City from here.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: It was still spring when I last set foot in this tower.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Much has happened within the last six months.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The chill has come, and the wind atop the city walls is strong. Do take care of yourself, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I imagine only a few from the court have seen Baizao from this angle.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Even from great heights, where the view stretches far, one's sight will sometimes be obscured by clouds.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: ...All the more reason that one should see and think before one acts.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Do you know why I asked you to become Advisor of Yumen?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: My thoughts were that you wanted me to broaden my horizons and see the big picture. An opportunity, but also a test.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: A test for what exactly?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: To see if I am worthy.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So you know why I have summoned you here today?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yes, Grand Tutor. You are disappointed in me.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: An excuse, or a genuine emotion?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I understand what I did during the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies was a terrible idea. But there was no other way.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Suspending the Feast will prevent the Grand Commandant from acting in drastic haste, and also allow the True Lung an opportunity.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Since your involvement in this slew of disputes, thrice have you been forced to make a choice, and each time you cast the riskiest die.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You placed your friends and even yourself onto the chessboard... have you never once felt hesitation?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I dare not claim it never crossed my mind... but I have always considered the choice most beneficial for all.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: ...A capable plotter, but the same cannot be said for your decision-making.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: My plan was to select a young talent—ambitious but not greedy, resourceful but selfless—and give them many chances to hone themselves. If the chance arose, I would entrust them with significant responsibilities.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I thought you were a suitable candidate... but it often does not end well when a chess player uses himself as a piece on the board.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You remind me of a colleague... who is no longer with us.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I am humbled...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: ...Liang Xun, given another chance, would you willingly leave Shangshu?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: When I started my studies, I was determined to apply my life's learning to the benefit of the people, regardless of whatever position I had gotten from mere chance...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: My original ambition remains, and I hold no regrets over the choices I made.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The incident at the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies cannot go unpunished.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I will submit myself to the law.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The Sky Mirror Pavilion's archive is lacking a transcriber, you will begin your duties there tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You have my gratitude, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What is this...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The time has come.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The clouds concentrate, completely obscuring the moonlight.
Have you met this one before...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Never.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Who exactly... is the opponent he seeks on this weiqi board...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: There are times when one seeks not an opponent to win against on the board, but a solution.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: A solution beneficial to both parties amid countless changes to the situation.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: There is something I wish to consult you on...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What made you set up that exam in the first place?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Shop's not closed yet, is it?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: You've come at the right time, I'll close right after I'm done with your order. It's late, so we don't have much left... but what would you like?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Anything to fill up my stomach on the road will do.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: We happen to have half a steamer of meat buns here from the morning. You can have it for free.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Won't you be making a loss like this?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: I only know how to cook, not so good at business stuff.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Why not earn a name and riches with skills like yours?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: What for? Both nobles and peasants eat the same three meals a day. I might as well make more buns than money or fame.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If you don't mind another question, how much does a meal normally cost here?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Not much at all. The usual soup and two dishes just cost a few coins.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Anyone who works here in Baizao can eat their fill here.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I see you have a kind heart and compassion for others.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Aw, stop that... I'm just a chef who serves about a hundred customers a day at most.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I can only count on you to feed and clothe everyone else in this realm.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: A free meal, and a lesson to boot... Lucky me.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Haha, I just hope you don't get mad at me. I just like aimlessly chatting with customers about everything under the sun.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Your restaurant has been here a long time, if I'm not wrong. How are your finances?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Aiya... Now that's a headache. You see, this little store of mine can barely make even.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: It's all thanks to the abundant crops from Dahuang and the fast deliveries from the Chidao that I can keep my store running. Otherwise, I'd have to raise the prices.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Are you sure you're not trying to give credit to your siblings?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Haha... but it doesn't stop here.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: My customers all live nearby. Some don't have enough coins, so they make up for it by sending me a few boxes of fresh fruit, or helping me repair the furniture...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Without their care, this restaurant wouldn't be running today.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: So, you see... It's hard to balance a book like this.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: But this is how you do business, right? Who says one side has to profit all the time? You give and you take. It's mutual prosperity that brings wealth and keeps the business thriving.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Your meat buns are ready and all packed, Grand Tutor. But why don't you try one now?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Not bad at all.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: A word of advice. Don't take any more lessons from your businessman brother.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Were you able to get a meal, sir?
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: Yes. I heard the buns from this place are the best in Baizao. Try one yourself.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Uh... hm... wow, it's delicious.
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: Alright, I'm ready to get back on the road. Where to?
attributes.name: Coachman

attributes.content: Shangshu...
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.text: ...How do I get there again?
The seven streets and five lanes in the east of the city... I remember having to pass a dye workshop and a kiln first...
*sigh* My head hurts. It's been so many years; I wonder what changes—Oh? This calligraphy and painting store is still here? Surely their store sign can nearly be considered a historical relic...
I could come back again for a stroll. Who knows, I might just find it—on second thought, I probably couldn't if I tried.
Phew, almost there...
This ancient temple hasn't changed at all. No one's been here in years, but it hasn't been torn down either... Just who is feeling nostalgic for it?
The lock's already opened?
Oh, you're back.
